title: Subject to the master plan for the whole cluster being followed, phase wise implementation of Urban Renewal Scheme may be allowed, with pro rata utilization of the total admissible FSI for rehab and incentive component simultaneously
clause_text: Subject to the master plan for the whole cluster being followed, phase wise implementation of Urban Renewal Scheme may be allowed, with pro rata utilization of the total admissible FSI for rehab and incentive component simultaneously.
